attributes.action: scrap Kelly's proposals for MP's pay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if, as gordon brown insists, the goverment is able to affect the country's economic situation all mp's should be paid by the country's economic performance.. kelly's proposals are to be scrapped and a law passed to set mp's pay at the start of each parliament at 3 times average UK pay and then be altered each year by the growth in the economy less inflation over 2 1/2%, as laid down by the treasury
